              ,
               
              there
              ,
               
              and
               
              everywhere
              ,
               
              enraged
              ,
               
              he
               
              slew
              .

speaker:
THIRD
               
              MESSENGER
text:
The
               
              French
               
              exclaimed
               
              the

              was
               
              in
               
              arms
              ;

THIRD
               
              MESSENGER
text:
All
               
              the
               
              whole
               
              army
               
              stood
               
              agazed
               
              on
               
              him
              .

speaker:
THIRD
               
              MESSENGER
text:
His
               
              soldiers
              ,
               
              spying
               
              his
               
              undaunted
               
              spirit
              ,

speaker:
THIRD
               
              MESSENGER
text:
“
              À
               
              Talbot
              !
               
              À
               
              Talbot
              !
              ”
               
              cried
               
              out
               
              amain

speaker:
THIRD
               
              MESSENGER
text:
And
               
              rushed
               
              into
               
              the
               
              bowels
               
              of
               
              the
               
              battle
              .

speaker:
THIRD
               
              MESSENGER
text:
Here
               
              had
               
              the
               
              conquest
               
              fully
               
              been
               
              sealed
               
              up

speaker:
THIRD
               
              MESSENGER
text:
If
               
              Sir
               
              John
               
              Fastolf
               
              had
               
              not
               
              played
               
              the
               
              coward
              .

speaker:
THIRD
               
              MESSENGER
text:
He
              ,
               
              being
               
              in
               
              the
               
              vaward
              ,
               
              placed
               
              behind

speaker:
THIRD
               
              MESSENGER
text:
With
               
              purpose
               
              to
               
              relieve
               
              and
               
              follow
               
              them
              ,

speaker:
THIRD
               
              MESSENGER
text:
Cowardly
               
              fled
              ,
               
              not
               
              having
               
              struck
               
              one
               
              stroke
              .

speaker:
THIRD
               
              MESSENGER
text:
Hence
               
              grew
               
              the
               
              general
               
              wrack
               
              and
               
              massacre
              .

speaker:
THIRD
               
              MESSENGER
text:
Enclosèd
               
              were
               
              they
               
              with
               
              their
               
              enemies
              .

speaker:
THIRD
               
              MESSENGER
text:
A
               
              base
               
              Walloon
              ,
               
              to
               
              win
               
              the
               
              Dauphin’s
               
              grace
              ,

speaker:
THIRD
               
              MESSENGER
text:
Thrust
               
              Talbot
               
              with
               
              a
               
              spear
               
              into
               
              the
               
              back
              ,

speaker:
THIRD
               
              MESSENGER
text:
Whom
               
              all
               
              France
              ,
               
              with
               
              their
               
              chief
               
              assembled
               
              strength
              ,

speaker:
THIRD
               
              MESSENGER
text:
Durst
               
              not
               
              presume
               
              to
               
              look
               
              once
               
              in
               
              the
               
              face
              .

speaker: BEDFORD
text:
Is
               
              Talbot
               
              slain
               
              then
              ?
               
              I
               
              will
               
              slay
               
              myself

speaker: BEDFORD
text:
For
               
              living
               
              idly
               
              here
              ,
               
              in
               
              pomp
               
              and
               
              ease
              ,

speaker: BEDFORD
text:
Whilst
               
              such
               
              a
               
              worthy
               
              leader
              ,
               
              wanting
               
              aid
              ,

speaker: BEDFORD
text:
Unto
               
              his
               
              dastard
               
              foemen
               
              is
               
              betrayed
              .

speaker:
THIRD
               
              MESSENGER
text:
O
              ,
               
              no
              ,
               
              he
               
              lives
              ,
               
              but
               
              is
               
              took
               
              prisoner
              ,

speaker:
THIRD
               
              MESSENGER
text:
And
               
              Lord
               
              Scales
               
              with
               
              him
              ,
               
              and
               
              Lord
               
              Hungerford
              ;

speaker:
THIRD
               
              MESSENGER
text:
Most
               
              of
               
              the
               
              rest
               
              slaughtered
               
              or
               
              took
               
              likewise
              .

speaker: BEDFORD
text:
His
               
              ransom
               
              there
               
              is
               
              none
               
              but
               
              I
               
              shall
               
              pay
              .

speaker: BEDFORD
text:
I’ll
               
              hale
               
              the
               
              Dauphin
               
              headlong
               
              from
               
              his
               
              throne
              ;

speaker: BEDFORD
text:
His
               
              crown
               
              shall
               
              be
               
              the
               
              ransom
               
              of
               
              my
               
              friend
              .

speaker: BEDFORD
text:
Four
               
              of
               
              their
               
              lords
               
              I’ll
               
              change
               
              for
               
              one
               
              of
               
              ours
              .

speaker: BEDFORD
text:
Farewell
              ,
               
              my
               
              masters
              ;
               
              to
               
              my
               
              task
               
              will
               
              I
              .

speaker: BEDFORD
text:
Bonfires
               
              in
               
              France
               
              forthwith
               
              I
               
              am
               
              to
               
              make
              ,

speaker: BEDFORD
text:
To
               
              keep
               
              our
               
              great
               
              Saint
               
              George’s
               
              feast
               
              withal
              .

speaker: BEDFORD
text:
Ten
               
              thousand
               
              soldiers
               
              with
               
              me
               
              I
               
              will
               
              take
              ,

speaker: BEDFORD
text:
Whose
               
              bloody

              shall
               
              make
               
              all
               
              Europe
               
              quake
              .

speaker:
THIRD
               
              MESSENGER
text:
So
               
              you
               
              had
               
              need
              ;
               
              ’fore

              besieged
              ,

speaker:
THIRD
               
              MESSENGER
text:
The

              is

              weak

              ;

THIRD
               
              MESSENGER
text:
The

              of

speaker:

              MESSENGER
text:
And
               
              hardly

              his
               
              men
               
              from
               
              mutiny
              ,

speaker:
THIRD
               
              MESSENGER
text:
Since
               
              they
               
              so

              watch
               
              such
               
              a
               
              multitude
              .

speaker: EXETER
text:
Remember
              ,
               
              lords
              ,
               
              your
               
              oaths
               
              to

              :

speaker: EXETER
text:
Either

text:

              .

text:
I
               
              do

              it
              ,

speaker: BEDFORD
text:
To
               
              go
               
              about
               
              my

              .

I’ll

              the

text:
To

              th’

text:

              young
               
              Henry
               
              king

speaker: EXETER
text:
To

              will
               
              I
              ,
               
              where
               
              the

              is

text:
Being

text:
And

              best

              .

speaker: WINCHESTER
text:
Each

              his
               
              place
               
              and
               
              function
               
              to
               
              attend
              .

speaker: WINCHESTER
text:
I

              out
              ;
               
              for

              .

text:
But
               
              long
               
              I

              not
               
              be
               
              Jack-out-of-office
              .

The
               
              King
               
              from

              ,

speaker: WINCHESTER
text:
And
